DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the antitussive (cough-suppressing) effects of two liquid medications: a combination of diphenhydramine and phenylephrine in a naturally cocoa flavoring, and, dextromethorphan syrup, compared with placebo.
DOC.brief_title: Antitussive Effect of a Naturally Flavored Syrup Containing Diphenhydramine, Compared With Dextromethorphan and Placebo
DOC.criteria: healthy adult nonsmokers onset of acute, viral upper respiratory tract infection (common cold) within 72 hours of enrollment smokers history of asthma or other respiratory disorders
